import json, sys
data = json.load(sys.stdin)
print(f'Open issues: {len(data)}')
# Check for duplicates
titles = {}
for issue in data:
    base = issue['title'].split(']')[0] + ']' if ']' in issue['title'] else issue['title']
    if base in titles:
        print(f\"❌ DUPLICATE: {issue['title']}\")
    titles[base] = titles.get(base, 0) + 1
print('✅ No duplicates found' if all(v == 1 for v in titles.values()) else '')"
